messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Due to your station not turning into another ''Greytide stationwide!'' Event, your station has been gifted an out-of date NT exploration vessel. It will dock at your arrivals port shortly.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Holodeck - 1218 AD.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Localized hyper-energetic flux wave detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Research Division.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Space Station 13. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Starboard Bow Maintenance.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Supply Department

Cargo: Seems we've ordered doubles of our department resupply packages this month. Can we send them to you?

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Attention, space station 13, your crew, mainly the engineering staff, are all being replaced, Centcomm officals will meet your shuttle at the docks and discuss your retirements, Thank you for your convience.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: I just want eeryone to know that thanks to the blood brothers being absolutely retarded - they were stopped before they could do anything harmful! smiley face

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Attention crew, you are all being replaced due to incompetence, N.O.V.A's reports bring light to serious issues. You are all fired.
